name: Zebra Technologies Corporation
bossPosition: Senior Vice President, General Counsel and Secretary
goal: With the unparalleled visibility Zebra (NASDAQ: ZBRA) provides, enterprises become as smart and connected as the world we live in. Real-time information – gleaned from visionary solutions including hardware, software and services – gives organizations the competitive edge they need to simplify operations, know more about their businesses and customers, and empower their mobile workers to succeed in today’s data-centric world. For more information, visit www.zebra.com.
interests: Business and Industry, Digital economy and society, Single market, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives: measures related to the Internet of Things, digitalization of industry, cyber-security certification, data flows, personal data protection and blockchain.
